# Create a map centered on the United States
us_map = folium.Map(location=[37,-96], tiles='openstreetmap', zoom_start=4)

# Add points to a marker cluster
mc = MarkerCluster()
for idx, row in lowes_data.iterrows():
    # Display the full store name and address when an individual marker is clicked.
    label = f'{row.name}\n{row.street_address}\n{row.city}, {row.state} {row.zip_code}'
    mc.add_child(Marker(location=[row['latitude'], row['longitude']], popup=label))
    
# add the marker cluster to the map
us_map.add_child(mc)

# Display the map
us_map
